================================================================================
				DIS APPLICATION SETTINGS DIALOG RELEASE NOTES
===============================================================================

Version 1.1.0.0
===============
23/07/2024
===============
Changes and Fixes:
- Updated error messgages for DB and file exceptions
- Added authentication for modifications

===============================================================================

Version 1.0.0.0
===============
26/06/2024
===============
Changes and Fixes:
- Fixed entity kind and domain data issues in comboboxes
- Added screen options to allow applications to send dialog position and made dialog moveable on the screen
- Disabled opening of multiple dialog instances  
- Minor design changes

===============================================================================

Initial Release 
===============
12/06/2024
===============
Features:
- Added dialog controls and file handling for DIS settings 
- Added modification option for DIS settings
- Displayed DIS network configurations read-only information from file
